title: Lamar Odom enjoys lunch with Khloe-like assistant in LA
title_page: Lamar Odom enjoys lunch with Khloe-like assistant in LA | Daily Mail Online
text:
Lamar Odom was spotted having lunch Wednesday in Los Angeles with pals and his assistant who has a striking resemblance to his ex-wife Khloe Kardashian.
The 37-year-old former professional basketball player kept it casual for his lunch outing in the Sherman Oaks area.
He wore a short-sleeved salmon hoodie, black sweatpants and Nike trainers while eating with male companions.
Lunch outing: Lamar Odom enjoyed lunch with friends Wednesday in Los Angeles and was met by his assistant who strongly resembles his ex-wife Khloe Kardashian
They dined outdoors at the Sweet Butter Kitchen known for its pastries, breakfast and lunch offerings.
Lamar was joined by his assistant who gave him a side hug while wearing a denim jacket, long white blouse and distressed skinny jeans.
She finished her ensemble with black heels and had her long blonde hair up in a ponytail.
Lamar was spotted with her earlier this month and TMZ reported that she's Lamar's assistant.
Work together: The former Los Angeles Lakers star got a side hug from his assistant
Catching up: Lamar and his assistant sat down at the outdoor venue in the Sherman Oaks area
Dead ringer: The assistant bears a striking resemblance to his ex-wife Khloe
Denim on denim: Khloe shared snaps of herself Sunday on Instagram wearing denim on denim
The former Los Angeles Lakers star was snapped Saturday with his teenage children at the Kids' Choice Awards in Los Angeles.
The Queens, New York native escorted aspiring model Destiny, 18, and 15-year-old Lamar Jr. to the awards ceremony at the Galen Center.
The 6ft10 Odom won two NBA championships with the Lakers and also played for the Los Angeles Clippers, Miami Heat and Dallas Mavericks.
Casual attire: Lamar kept it casual in a hoodie, sweatpants and trainers
Lamar married reality star Khloe Kardashian, 32, in September 2009 after a month of dating.
Khloe and Lamar met at a party for his mercurial Lakers teammate Ron Artest.
Their wedding was featured on Khloe's family reality show Keeping Up With The Kardashians and they starred in the spin-off Khloe & Lamar that was canceled in 2012 after two seasons.
Soft drink: The former NBA player washed down his meal with a soft drink
Hanging out: Lamar and his pals ate al fresco at the Sweet Butter Kitchen
Looking around: The former pro athlete enjoyed people watching at the restaurant
Khloe filed for divorce in December 2013 but proceedings were dismissed by request in October 2015.
Lamar nearly died following a binge at a Nevada brothel in October 2015 and the divorce was temporarily called off so Khloe could help make medical decisison during his recovery.
It was recently revealed that Lamasr entered a rehab facility last December for a 30-day stint as 'a precautionary measure' as Lamar was aiming 'to stay clear and focused' in 2017.
Lamar has been working on his own reality show that will document his road to recovery.
Taking off: Lamar climbed into the passenger seat while leaving the restaurant
